overview:
As Senior VP of Global Sales, Frank Maylett leads the AtTask sales team with a philosophy of “I to the power of three—Intensity, Intelligence and Integrity.” This mantra empowers his team to focus on the company vision and has consistently set records for bookings and average deal size.

As a key driver in repositioning inContact from a telecommunications company to a provider of cloud-based contact center software, Frank was instrumental in growing and expanding the sales organization on an international level, opening offices in the Philippines and London. A tech sales veteran, Frank was responsible for building Brocade’s Americas sales organization from the ground up, consistently exceeded revenue targets for the worldwide IBM sales team greater than $120 million and served as the vice president of central area sales for Kabira Technologies and vice president of worldwide sales for ReleaseNow.

Frank holds a Bachelor of Science from the University of Phoenix.
